msg: * index.html: Added a blurb about contributors having read
and not write access to the source code repository.

author: malderson
msg: Fixed DIRSERVER-895, where a server will never accept replication logs until it is restarted if a connection is closed during a replication transaction (e.g. due to a message timeout).  No test for this yet as other issues would prevent it from being reliable.
